sparqldsl

```{r echo=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(
  comment = "#>",
  collapse = TRUE,
  warning = FALSE,
  message = FALSE

```

A SPARQL DSL

## Install

Development version

```{r eval=FALSE}
devtools::install_github("ropenscilabs/sparqldsl")
```

```{r}
library("sparqldsl")
```

For examples we'll use DBpedia

## ask

```{r}
sparql_dsl("http://dbpedia.org/sparql") %>% ask(s, p, o)
```

## select

```{r}
sparql_dsl("http://dbpedia.org/sparql") %>%
  select() %>%
  where(s, p, o) %>%
  limit(10)
```
